name: TanisuSword
description:
This game is a pixel art vertical scrolling shooter.

Press and hold the spacebar to fire the sword repeatedly.

Use the cross-keys to move the player.

If you take the sword, the shooting speed will be faster.

Take the shield to protect yourself from a certain number of enemy attacks.

Take the boots to move faster.

Enter a house to recover HP.

This game is a prototype that is currently in production.

You can play only stage 1.

Stage 2 can be selected after clearing stage 1, but it is still under development.
